description: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
### Temporary Help Services Tender Announcement

**Title/Title (English/French):** Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Reference Number/Numero de reference:** cb-944-85067795

**Publication Date/Date de Publication:** 2023-09-28

**Tender Closing Date/Appel D'Offres Date Cloture:** 2023-10-05T10:30:00

**Contracting Entity/Entit'e Contractante:** Department of National Defense

**Location/Emplacement:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Tender Details

* **Tender Status:** Expiré
* **Amsterdam:** N/A
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélective

### Notice Description/Décription de l'avis

The Department of National Defense required Temporary Help Services. The requirement is open to supply arrangement holders, EN578-172870, who are qualified under the Human Resources-General category.

### Tender Documents/Document d'appel d'offres

Documents related to the tender can be found on the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website at the following link:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20542/s4654718-rfp-competitive-method-2_0.pdf

### Contact/Informations de contact

In case you may have any questions, please send them via email to our contact at CFSG(O-G) Temp Help:

* Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 971-7955
* Fax: (not available)

### Additional Information

This requirement involves a competitive process with a minimum security level of DOS - Reliability for the resource.

The entities that have been invited to submit a proposal are listed above.
 
Please note that the requirement is now closed, and no more submissions are being accepted. I wrote this in a professional style without adding any other text or information that is not present in the original entry. I also reformatted the content as a response in dedicated sections. I formatted this with Markdown for easier reading. Let me know if you have any other questions or need further clarification.  400. ````
